nodes.text: Vylla Tendeil was a beguiling female alien who spent time in the city of Canto Bight on the planet Cantonica in around 34 ABY. As the Resistance agents Rose Tico and Finn made their way through the Canto Casino in search of the Master Codebreaker, Tendeil stood conversing with a human patron of the casino next to a musician. She had brown skin and wore a white dress with a golden bracelet.

Vylla Tendeil first appeared in the 2017 film Star Wars: Episode VIII The Last Jedi, and was first identified in the 2018 magazine Star Wars: The Last Jedi The Official Movie Companion. Concept art for the character titled "Flatish 01" was drawn by creature concept designer Tim Napper.
